price: Эгер бир нерсени (жаратууну) кааласа, Анын иши «Бол!» деп айтуудан гана турат. Анан ал нерсе болуп калат.
arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيۡـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Kyrgyz translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Kyrgyz language, translated by Shams al-Din Hakimov Abd al-Khaleq, reviewed and developed under the supervision of the Rowad Translation Center.

meta.transliteration: innamā amruhu idhā arāda shayan an yaqūla lahu kun fayakūnu
